Definition at line 98 of file mcFramework.py.

def AssimilationFramework::mcFramework::MonteCarloFramework::setForkSamples (   self,
  fork,
  nrCPUs = 1 
)

Sets the forking of samples on or off.

Parameters:
fork True or False.

When forking is on EVERY sample will be forked to its own process. This is mainly useful on a cluster with automatic process migration or on SMP machines.

Warning:
setrandomseed does not work when forking is enabled
not available on Windows
